page.title: 04THE VILLAGE CENTRE-ELDWICK
page.content: In the centre of Eldwick you will see {a clinic}and a carpark behind the bus shelter.The next road off right leads to our{Scout hut}that is really stone. Further down you come to shops on both sides of the road.Down to the left you will see a{paper shop,}and nearby a {bakers.}On the opposite side of the road is a long old stone building that includes a{Post Office/General Store a{butchers,a hairdressers}and the {greengrocers.}Next door is Frank's {fish shop.}Still on the main road is another hairdressers and a large {garage.}Opposite is the{Birches Club and the{Memorial Hall.}Between these and the{church}a road goes to the {tennis club}and the{Rec}with things like swings and a climbing frame to play on,as well as the soccer pitch. Next down the main road is the{school, {church,the Acorn pub and Eldwick Beck.
